storage::types::CharacterVarying< N, charT > Class Template Reference

The CharacterVarying class is a buffer for database strings. The buffer size can only be set when the object is created so that bindings to the object will remain stable. More...

#include <storage/types/character_varying.h>

Detailed Description

template<size_t N, class charT = db_ansi_t>
class storage::types::CharacterVarying< N, charT >

The CharacterVarying class is a buffer for database strings. The buffer size can only be set when the object is created so that bindings to the object will remain stable.
